page.title: 16TRANSPORT PAISLEY
page.content: Outside our school runs the Barrhead Road which runs from Paisley towards Nitshill,on the outskirts of Glasgow. It is a very busy road because it carries traffic from Paisley to the southern suburbs of Glasgow and links up with other roads to East Kilbride etc. The road is particularly busy in the early morning and in the evening. The speed limit for traffic using the road is 40m.p.h.Several people including pupils from the school have been knocked down on this road. Another problem with the road is the fact that the exit from the Hawkhead private housing estate is onto this road. This leads to more chance of accidents.It has been suggested that traffic lights be put up outside the school but so far nothing has been done.The school does discourage pupils from crossing the road.
